name: Containment: The Zombie Puzzler
description: Containment the Zombie Puzzler is an action puzzle game. The goal of Containment is to surround zombies with survivors of the same color. The zombies have the ability to fight back, as well, infecting your survivors if you do not eliminate them in time. Throughout the game you will use your wits, items you find you along the way, and even the town around you to survive the outbreak.
